node.value: Implemented authoritative game server in Java with player synchronization and match management

arena-game.title: Arena
arena-game.content:
A fast-paced multiplayer 1v1 capture the flag game built with GameMaker and Java backend.
This project combines my game development roots with my backend programming skills to
create a competitive multiplayer experience.Studied various multiplayer game architectures, latency compensation techniques,
and anti-cheat systems to inform the design decisions.Built the game client in GameMaker with smooth movement, responsive controls, and network communicationImplemented authoritative game server in Java with player synchronization and match managementDesign and implement skill-based matchmaking for balanced competitive matchesBuilding multiplayer games presents unique challenges around network synchronization,
latency compensation, and maintaining game state consistency across clients.
